## UserInputQuestion.placeholder property

placeholder in the input text box placeholder can have dynamic value defined by a function with type `LocalFunc<string | undefined>`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
placeholder?: string | LocalFunc<string | undefined>;
```
